sentence.Network_en: Any of various small freshwater fishes of the family Cyprinidae, which also includes carps and minnows.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲤科小鱼或其它小的淡水或咸水鱼(尤其是鲱鱼);通常整条鱼烹饪.
